data.persona: Flap flap flap. Worm! ANOTHER BIRD! Time to poop.
data.description:
You are in the Old Queen Farm.
Once a fairly profitable farm, the Old Queen Farm is now a deteriorated old shack surrounded by uninhabitable fields with soil incapable of growing even weeds. The farm house shows signs that is being occupied by wild animals, and the roof is beginning to cave inwards.
The owl and the rat are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want the rat to be my friend.
data.mid_motivation: I don't want to fight with rats anymore.
data.long_motivation: I want to work together with other fauna to collect food and then equally distribute it.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go the old queen farm to look for food.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield the soil to form a hole to store food in.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: hit the soil with my claws, while filling the hole with food scraps. The rat approaches...

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: hug the rat again. The creature is confused and wanting to know why I am being so friendly and so eager to share my food.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give advice to the rat about wealth equality among fauna.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: eat food with the rats of the farm, while conducting peace talks.
